name: Optics
description: A comprehensive introduction to the physics of light. Topics may vary but will include: electromagnetic waves and propagation of light, basic coherence concepts and the interference of light, Fraunhofer and Fresnel diffraction, matrix methods in paraxial optics, Fresnel equations, polarization and birefringence. Technical applications will include lasers, optical fibers and optical detectors and displays. [24L, 16P, 8T]
